item.description:
Movie is at 5pm at the somerville theater.  I will be out of town, I'm afraid, but Rich has kindly agreed to take over hosting.  Let me know how it is!

 

The new Gatsby movie comes out May 10th!  Let's find our old paperbacks from high school and go see the movie together.  If you want to be extra prepared you can brush up on the Robert Redford version so we can compare.  Exact movie time TBD when the schedule is out.  We'll follow up with a discussion somewhere in the square.

Book
item.name: Great Gatsby Movie/Book Club
